attributes.action: Extend summer holidays for schools from 6 weeks to 8-10 weeks
attributes.additional_details: You guys should extend from 6 weeks which is only 1 month and 2 weeks it also isn’t enough for teachers which is why they sometimes go on strike for because of their holidays . It will be helpful if they make it 2 months always for all schools across they UK
attributes.background: This will be really helpful since the UK children are upset about 6 weeks and instead insist for more because other countries like Germany,Italy and Spain have a longer summer holiday from June to September . I say if we all contribute to sign this kids won’t be upset and will be really happy of it.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the length of school holidays are a matter for local authorities and individual schools, not the UK Government or Parliament.
